vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἁγι-άζω,
={ἁγίζω}, [LXX+1st c.AD+]:—passive, ἁγιασθήτω τὸ ὄνομά σου[NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to sanctify, set apart, make holy; this can mean active dedication and service to God or the act of regarding or honoring as holy
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to sanctify, set apart, make holy; this can mean active dedication and service to God or the act of regarding or honoring as holy
to separate, consecrate; cleanse, purify; regard, or reverence as holy
vocabInfos._es_Definition: poner aparte como sagrado para Dios; hacer santo, consagrar; considerar como sagrado; purificar, limpiar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1)歸為聖(為著禮儀目的將某些東西分別出來)
2)成聖,歸為聖
3)尊為聖
4)使潔淨
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1)归为圣(为着礼仪目的将某些东西分别出来)
2)成圣,归为圣
3)尊为圣
4)使洁净
